text: Cheilophlebium is a fungal genus in the order Agaricales. It is incertae sedis with respect to familial placement within the order. The genus is monotypic, containing the single species Cheilophlebium villosum, described by Philipp Maximilian Opiz in 1856. According to the Dictionary of the Fungi (10th edition, 2008), the genus name is a nomen dubium (of unknown or doubtful application). ==References== Category:Agaricales incertae sedis Category:Fungi described in 1856 Category:Monotypic Agaricales genera
title: Cheilophlebium
